title: How to Beat Mimi for the Second Time on Super Paper Mario

steps.headline: Use Barry and Peach.
steps.description: When Mimi's attacking with her Rubees, Peach is able to deflect them.

steps.headline: When she comes down, with precise timing, jump on her and use Barry.
Combo her.
steps.description: When Rubees get close to you, use Barry.

steps.headline: Use Mario and Carrie.
steps.description: When Mimi flips, so can you.

steps.headline: With no protection, flip when you are about to be hit.
steps.description: Don't forget to flip back when your 3D meter is running low.

steps.headline: When Mimi comes down, use Carrie to destroy her Rubees and get through her barrier.
Use Thoreau and Peach.
steps.description: Use Tippi's advice and use Thoreau to throw Mimi's Rubees at her.

steps.headline: Use Peach and her parasol to avoid losing HP.

text: Combination One Use Barry and Peach. When Mimi's attacking with her Rubees, Peach is able to deflect them. When she comes down, with precise timing, jump on her and use Barry.  Combo her. When Rubees get close to you, use Barry. Combination Two Use Mario and Carrie. When Mimi flips, so can you. With no protection, flip when you are about to be hit. Don't forget to flip back when your 3D meter is running low. When Mimi comes down, use Carrie to destroy her Rubees and get through her barrier.  Combination Three Use Thoreau and Peach. Use Tippi's advice and use Thoreau to throw Mimi's Rubees at her. Use Peach and her parasol to avoid losing HP.
